trans-unit.source: Defines the contract a Web Parts control implements to pass a parameter value in a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 定义 Web 部件控件为 Web 部件连接中传递参数值而实现的协定。

trans-unit.source: Data is usually sent from a provider to a consumer in a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 数据通常发送从提供程序到 Web 部件连接中的使用者。

trans-unit.source: However, in some cases, a provider needs a parameter from the consumer to determine which values it should send back.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在某些情况下，提供程序需要从的使用者确定它应发送回哪些值的参数。

trans-unit.source: The IWebPartParameters interface defines members to implement that facilitate the passing of a parameter from a consumer to a provider.
trans-unit.target: IWebPartParameters 接口定义的成员来实现，以方便的使用者提供程序传递参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> class implements the IWebPartParameters interface.
Transformers are used to translate data between two Web Parts controls with incompatible connection points.
trans-unit.target: 转换器用于将两个连接点不兼容的 Web 部件控件之间的数据转换。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> object transforms data from a provider implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface when the provider needs a parameter from the consumer.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>对象将数据从实现的提供程序转换<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>接口时提供程序需要从使用者的参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A> method retrieves the data from the provider and provides a callback method to process the data for the consumer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A>方法从提供程序检索数据，并且提供一个回调方法来处理这些数据使用者。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The callback method can be a customized method within the consumer that sets the return values accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 回调方法可以相应地设置返回的值在使用者内自定义的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the data from the connection provider.
trans-unit.target: 从连接提供程序中获取的数据的值。

trans-unit.source: The GetParametersData method is used to retrieve the values from the provider based on a parameter.
trans-unit.target: GetParametersData 方法用于检索从提供程序基于参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The method represented by the `callback` parameter processes the data for use by the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的方法`callback`参数处理由使用者使用的数据。

trans-unit.source: The method to call to process the data from the provider.
trans-unit.target: 要调用以处理从提供程序数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property descriptors for the data to be received by the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 获取要由使用者接收的数据的属性描述符。

trans-unit.source: The Schema property provides property information for the data passed by the interface.
trans-unit.target: 架构属性提供由接口传递的数据的属性信息。

trans-unit.source: Transformer and consumer controls can query this property to get information about the type, contents, and other details of the field contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> interface instance.
trans-unit.target: Transformer 和使用者的控件可以查询此属性以获取有关类型内容的信息以及其他详细信息的字段包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters>接口实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters>

trans-unit.source: Sets the property descriptors for the properties that the consumer receives when calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData*> method.
trans-unit.target: 设置使用者接收时调用的属性的属性描述符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData*>
